pages.text: A powerful protective sigil that grants temporary spectator mode and can prevent death. Functions like a reusable Totem of Undying powered by LP.

pages.title: Manual Use
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() Right-click$(br)$(bold)LP Cost:$() 5,000 LP (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Duration:$() 10 seconds (configurable)$(br2)Grants temporary spectator mode, allowing you to scout areas or escape danger. You are teleported back to your original position before the effect ends.

pages.title: Death Prevention
pages.text: $(bold)Automatic Trigger:$() When you would die with this sigil in your inventory, it automatically activates if you have enough LP.$(br2)$(bold)Healing:$() When triggered by death, you receive 5 hearts of healing after returning from spectator mode.$(br2)$(bold)Cooldown:$() 60 seconds (configurable) between death prevention triggers.

pages.title: Anti-Exploit
pages.text: $(bold)Position Lock:$() You are teleported back to your original position 0.5 seconds before spectator mode ends, preventing wall-clipping exploits.$(br2)$(italic)The soul slips free of death's grasp... for a price.$()
